us.title: Immutable Decentralized Disk Storage
us.text:
The most easy way to store any files on web3.

Use it like a hard disk.

Uploading file on web3 storage has never been easier.

us.title: Why using web3 storage
us.text:
Fear of losing your data ?

Worried about the ravages a hacker can make by encrypting your data to make them inaccessible ?

With a disk on the blockchain no more risk !

us.title: Write Once
us.text:
The blockchain is immutable (no data can be erase), so your disk is on Write Once mode.

You CANNOT rename ou delete file or folder, and you CANNOT modify a file.

us.title: Read by anyone
us.text: Remember that anyone can read your data. Only save the data that you want to share and have rights to.

us.title: Storage
us.text:
The content of file can be storage on blockchain or ipfs.

For Files with a size of less than 1000 bytes, storage on blockchain is recommended.

The files with size more than 16000 bytes must be storage on ipfs.

For other sizes, you can save on blockchain or ipfs.

us.title: Let's go
us.text: Just clic on 'Demo' button for create or use your own disk.
